instruction for https://www.hopetoshine.in/mygifts swiper issue

step1: add swiper propery uniqueNavElements: true to all three swiper config functions in public config: SwiperConfigInterface, public configDesktop: SwiperConfigInterface 
and public configFirstDesktop: SwiperConfigInterface

step2:replace navigation property as below in public config: SwiperConfigInterface function

navigation: {
      nextEl: '.swiper-button-next2',
      prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev2',
    }
	
step3:replace navigation property as below in public configDesktop: SwiperConfigInterface function

navigation: {
      nextEl: '.swiper-button-next1',
      prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev1',
    }
	
step4:replace navigation property as below in public configswip: SwiperConfigInterface function

navigation: {
      nextEl: '.swiper-button-next4',
      prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev4',
    }
